What is PolySwarm Client?¶

This is a WIP client library to simplify interacting with a polyswarmd instance from Python.

This documentation consists of the base polyswarm-client which can be found in the PolySwarm Client Module section, and the example drivers. These consist of Ambassador, Arbiter, and Microengine.

Check out the PolySwarm Docs for more information on how to get started.
